Posts.Title: Chenheart -- Any word, or updates?

Posts.Content: Hi Just Me,  I just hit my four year anniversary - mets to the bone right from the start.  I have never hit "NED" but all that is going on with me is very managable!  It will take you a little while to wrap your thoughts around everything - which is normal.  If you need to chat - please send me a message.  I will help with any questions that you might have.  Always remember to be good to yourself! (((Hugs))) Shannon
